body.name: Lenovo L22e-40 – Everyday Monitor - 21.45" FHD Display - 75Hz - 4ms–16ms Response Time - AMD FreeSync - Low Bluelight Certified - Tilt Stand - HDMI 1.4 - VGA - Audio Out
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 12 mins
FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 12 mins
features: ELEVATE YOUR HOME OFFICE - The slim, modern look of the Lenovo 22e-40 Monitor fits into your setup for your hybrid work lifestyle and helps you get work done with ease
CLEAR AS CRYSTAL - Full-screen large files for your work projects and view images and documents in high-resolution on the large, nearly 22-inch screen, 1920x1080 FHD display

ADJUST FOR YOUR COMFORT - Adjust the screen forward and back between -5 to 22 degrees to achieve your perfect angle, and see the 3-sided NearEdgeless screen perfectly from 178-degree wide viewing angles

CHIC AND MINIMALIST DESIGN - The sleek, cloud grey color of this Lenovo computer monitor complements your desk setup and features built-in cable management at the back and an integrated smartphone stand in the base, ensuring a clutter-free workspace
CENTERED ON SAFETY - Burn the midnight oil in a safe, comfortable way, with Eyesafe 2.0 and TÜV Hardware Low Blue Light certifications protecting your eyes from strain and harmful blue light
SMOOTH AS BUTTER - AMD FreeSync technology and 75Hz refresh rate makes all your shows, movies, and games sync up perfectly without stutter, lag or screen tearing

SIMPLE-TO-USE SMART FEATURES - Lenovo Artery Software lets you use your computer monitor your way, with smart features for adjusting settings for different tasks at any time of day (Must use Windows 10 or Windows 11)
EQUIPPED FOR WORK AND PLAY - Connect your laptop, console, or any other device using the 1 HDMI and 1 VGA input ports
SIZE UNPACKED WITH STAND IN HIGHEST POSITION (D x H x W) - 491.6 x 401.6 x 182.8 mm or 19.35 x 15.81 x 7.19 inches
INCLUDED ITEMS - Monitor with stand, 1.8m power cable, 1.8m HDMI cable, Quick Setup Guide, Warranty Booklet, 1 screw
body.description: Accomplish all your work for the day and enjoy your choice of entertainment with the crystal-clear Full HD resolution Lenovo L22e-40 computer monitor. The expansive 21.45-inch, nearly edgeless display is 6.9mm thin and made of 85% recycled resin in the product plastic to fit right into your home office setup. This Lenovo monitor is TÜV Rheinland Eye Comfort, TÜV Low Blue Light, and Eyesafe Display certified to perfectly complement your home life.
